constituent: discontinue, thread, spiderman, colour, color, bound up, mosaic
koohiiStory1: I can't finish my sewing project because the thread color I was using was discontinued.
koohiiStory2: As times move on and fashion tastes inevitably change, threads of certain colors often get discontinued.
readingExamples: 絶える (た.える), 絶つ (た.つ), 絶やす (た.やす)
words: to die out, to peter out, to become extinct
to sever, to cut off, to suppress, to abstain (from)
to stop, to cease, to come to an end
